casebody.data:
No. 10-8262. Alvin Harvey, Petitioner v. Louisiana. 562 U.S. 1268, 131 S. Ct. 1610,

179 L. Ed. 2d 496,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2083. March 7, 2011.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Louisiana dismissed. See Rule 39.8.

Same case below, 38 So. 3d 316.
